args.canonical_rel_desc: Indicates that a cultural practice, custom, or ritual serves as an expression or manifestation of an underlying cultural belief, value, or attitude.
args.justification: All five relations link ancient Egyptian burial practices (a cultural practice) to underlying beliefs or values (afterlife beliefs or reverence for the deceased) with identical semantics of expression/manifestation. Normalizing them under a single canonical predicate 'expresses_cultural_belief_or_value' with a shared description improves schema consistency while preserving the existing, appropriate relation class and group.
